Usage: test-app --task.token=STRING --task.allocation=STRING --kube.task-pod=STRING [flags]

Flags:
  -h, --help                       Show context-sensitive help.
      --o11y-level="info"          Set the logging level ($O11Y_LEVEL)
      --o11y-format="color"        Format used for stderr and file logging
                                   ($O11Y_FORMAT)
      --o11y-file="-"              ($O11Y_FILE)
      --runner-api="https://runner.circleci.com"
                                   Runner API base URL ($RUNNER_API)
      --shutdown-delay=DURATION    Delay before shutting the service down on
                                   SIGTERM ($SHUTDOWN_DELAY)
      --task.token=STRING          Bearer token for a task ($TASK_TOKEN)
      --task.allocation=STRING     Allocation ID to uniquely identify this task
                                   attempt ($TASK_ALLOCATION)
      --kube.config="~/.kube/config"
                                   Location of the kubeconfig file
                                   ($KUBE_CONFIG)
      --kube.namespace="circleci"
                                   The Kubernetes namespace ($KUBE_NAMESPACE)
      --kube.task-pod=STRING       Name of the task pod this logger is in
                                   ($KUBE_TASK_POD)
